import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { Heading, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Text, Button, Link, Flex, ArrowDownIcon } from 'waltor-uikit' import Container from 'components/Container' import FirstCard from './FirstCard' import SecondCard from './SecondCard' import FAQ from './FAQ' const Wrapper = styled.div` max-width: 436px; width: 100%; z-index: 5; ` const Header = styled.div` background: ${({ theme }) => theme.colors.gradients.bubblegum}; width: 100%; padding: 32px; ` const ArrowSeparator = () => ( ) const Migration = () => { return ( <>
LP Token Migration PancakeSwap is being upgraded!
Migrate your LP tokens to continue earning.
Add Liquidity to new Liquidity Pools Stake your tokens in the updated Liquidity Pools Any new liquidity you add will use the updated system by default. Simple! Stake in New Farms Stake your updated LP tokens in PancakeSwap farms If you are able to stake in a farm with your new LP tokens, that means it’s the updated type. Stake as usual and you’re done! ) } export default Migration
